nodes.text: Kreet'ah was a Kian'thar Vigo of Black Sun during Prince Xizor's time.
Kreet'ah had been trained from birth for criminal leadership and inherited his position as Vigo from his mother, just as his daughter was in line to inherit his position from him.

Kreet'ah used a vast network of spies to infiltrate the megacorporations that worked for the Galactic Empire. He provided much vital information to Prince Xizor about companies such as the SoroSuub Corporation, Sienar Fleet Systems, and Kuat Drive Yards.
